Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, FirmName as firmName from FirmMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, FirmName as firmName from FirmMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE FirmMaster SET FirmName = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, ExpenseCategory as expenseCategory from ExpenseCategoryMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, ExpenseCategory as expenseCategory from ExpenseCategoryMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE ExpenseCategoryMaster SET ExpenseCategory = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, City as city from CityMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, City as city from CityMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE CityMaster SET City = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: SELECT FirmId as firmId, FirmName as firmName,ProjectName as projectName,CityId as cityId, CityName as cityName,LocationId as locationId,Location as location,Address as address,ProjectId as projectId,BusinessValue as businessValue FROM ProjectMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: SELECT FirmId as firmId, FirmName as firmName,ProjectName as projectName,CityId as cityId, CityName as cityName,LocationId as locationId,Location as location,Address as address,BusinessValue as businessValue,ProjectId as projectId FROM ProjectMaster WHERE ProjectId = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE ProjectMaster SET FirmId = ? ,FirmName = ? ,ProjectName = ?,CityId = ? ,CityName = ? ,LocationId = ? ,Location= ? ,Address= ? ,BusinessValue= ? ) WHERE ProjectId = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, CityId as cityId, CityName as cityName, Location as location from LocationMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, CityId as cityId, CityName as cityName, Location as location from LocationMaster where Id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE LocationMaster SET CityId = ?, CityName = ?, Location = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, PropertyType as PropertyType from PropertyTypeMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, PropertyType as PropertyType from PropertyTypeMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE PropertyTypeMaster SET PropertyType = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, BankName as bankName, Branch as branch,AccountNumber as accountNumber,IFSCCode as ifscCode from BankMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, BankName as bankName, Branch as branch ,AccountNumber as accountNumber,IFSCCode as ifscCode from BankMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE BankMaster SET BankName = ?,Branch = ?, AccountNumber = ?, IFSCCode = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, KhasraNumber as khasraNumber,LandAmount as landValue, PaidAmount as paidAmount from LandMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select l.Id as id, KhasraNumber as khasraNumber,LandAmount as landAmount, PaidAmount as paidAmount, f.FarmerName as farmerName,f.PanNumber as panNumber from LandMaster l INNER JOIN FarmerMaster f on f.LandId = l.Id where l.Id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE LandMaster SET KhasraNumber = ?, LandAmount = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, FarmerName as farmerName,AdhaarNo as adhaarNo, PanNumber as panNumber,Bank as bank, Branch as branch, IFSCCode as ifscCode, PaidAmount as paidAmount from FarmerMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, FarmerName as farmerName,AdhaarNo as adhaarNo, PanNumber as panNumber,Bank as bank, Branch as branch, IFSCCode as ifscCode, PaidAmount as paidAmount from FarmerMaster where id = ?
Service.InsertQuery: INSERT INTO FarmerMaster (FarmerName,AdhaarNo,PanNumber,Bank, Branch, IFSCCode,PaidAmount) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE FarmerMaster SET FarmerName = ?, AdhaarNo = ?,PanNumber = ?,Bank = ?, Branch = ?, IFSCCode =?, PaidAmount = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select AgentId as id,AgentName as agentName ,PanNumber as panNumber ,AdhaarNo as adhaarNo ,Address as address ,City as city ,State as state ,PinCode as pinCode ,emailId as emailId ,PhoneNo as phoneNo ,DateOfJoining as dateOfJoining,DateOfBirth as dateOfBirth,Occupation as occupation ,sponsorId as sponsorId ,sponsorName as sponsorName, Bank as bank ,Branch as branch ,AccountNumber as accountNumber ,IFSCCode as ifscCode ,Status as status ,LoginId as loginId ,Designation as designation from AgentMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select AgentId as id,AgentName as agentName ,PanNumber as panNumber ,AdhaarNo as adhaarNo ,Address as address ,City as city ,State as state ,PinCode as pinCode ,emailId as emailId ,PhoneNo as phoneNo ,DateOfJoining as dateOfJoining,DateOfBirth as dateOfBirth,Occupation as occupation ,sponsorId as sponsorId ,sponsorName as sponsorName ,Bank as bank ,Branch as branch ,AccountNumber as accountNumber ,IFSCCode as ifscCode ,Status as status ,LoginId as loginId ,Designation as designation, TotalAmount as totalAmount, AmountPaidTillNow as paidAmount from AgentMaster WHERE AgentId = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE AgentMaster SET AgentName = ?,PanNumber = ?,AdhaarNo = ?,Address = ?,City = ?,State = ?,PinCode = ?,emailId = ?,PhoneNo = ?,DateOfJoining = ?,DateOfBirth = ?,Occupation = ?,sponsorId = ?,sponsorName = ?,Bank = ?,Branch = ?,AccountNumber = ?,IFSCCode = ?,Status = ?,LoginId = ?,Designation = ? WHERE AgentId = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, FirmId as firmId,FirmName as firmName,PropertyId as propertyId,PropertyName as propertyName,PLCName as plcName ,PLCCharge as plcCharge,Id as id , ChargeType as chargeType from PLCMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, FirmId as firmId,FirmName as firmName,PropertyId as propertyId,PropertyName as propertyName,PLCName as plcName ,PLCCharge as plcCharge,Id as id , ChargeType as chargeType from PLCMaster where Id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE PLCMaster SET FirmId = ?, FirmName = ?,PropertyId = ?, PropertyName = ?,PLCName =?,PLCCharge =?, ChargeType = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, PlotSize as plotSize, SqFtRate as sqftRate, PLCType as PLCType, PLCTypeId as plcTypeId,Status as status from PlotDetails
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, PlotSize as plotSize, SqFtRate as sqftRate, PLCType as plcType, PLCTypeId as plcTypeId,Status as status from PlotDetails where Id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE PlotDetails SET FirmId=?, FirmName = ?,ProjectId = ?, ProjectName = ?,BlockId =?,Block =?, PlotNo = ?,Facing = ?, PlotSize = ?, SqFtRate = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, FirmId as firmId,FirmName as firmName, PropertyId as propertyId,PropertyName as propertyName,Block as block from BlockMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, FirmId as firmId,FirmName as firmName, PropertyId as propertyId,PropertyName as propertyName,Block as block from BlockMaster where Id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE BlockMaster SET FirmId = ?, FirmName = ?,PropertyId = ?, PropertyName = ? , BlockId = ?, Block = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, FirmId as firmId,FirmName as firmName, PropertyId as propertyId,PropertyName as propertyName,AdditionalCharges as additionalCharges,Rate as rate,ChargesType as chargesType from AdditionalChargesMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, FirmId as firmId,FirmName as firmName, PropertyId as propertyId,PropertyName as propertyName,AdditionalCharges as additionalCharges,Rate as rate,ChargesType as chargesType from AdditionalChargesMaster where Id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE AdditionalChargesMaster SET FirmId = ?, FirmName = ?,PropertyId = ?, PropertyName = ?,AdditionalCharges =?,Rate =?, ChargesType = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id, InvestorName as investorName, Address as address , PhoneNumber as phoneNumber from InvestorMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, InvestorName as investorName, Address as address , PhoneNumber as phoneNumber from InvestorMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE InvestorMaster SET Address = ? , PhoneNumber = ? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Id as id,InvestorId as investorId, InvestorName as investorName, FirmId as firmId ,FirmName as firmName, PropertyId as propertyId, PropertyName as propertyName,DATE_FORMAT(InvestmentDate ,'%d/%m/%Y') as investmentDate, Amount as amount from InvestmentMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Id as id, InvestorId as investorId, InvestorName as investorName, FirmId as firmId ,FirmName as firmName, PropertyId as propertyId, PropertyName as propertyName,DATE_FORMAT(InvestmentDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as investmentDate, Amount as amount from InvestmentMaster where id = ?
Service.UpdateQuery: UPDATE InvestmentMaster SET FirmId = ? , FirmName = ?,PropertyId = ?,PropertyName=? ,InvestmentDate =?, Amount =? WHERE Id = ?

Service.SelectQuery: select Name as name, role as Role, UserId as userId from UserMaster
Service.SelectQueryById: select Name as name, role as Role, UserId as userId from UserMaster where Id = ?
Service.InsertQuery: INSERT INTO UserMaster (Name ,Role, PanNumber , DateOfBirth ) VALUES (?,?,?,?)

Transaction.UpdateQuery: UPDATE BookingDetails SET CustomerId =? , FirmId = ?,FirmName = ?,ProjectId = ?,ProjectName = ?,PropertyType = ?,PropertyTypeId = ?,BlockId = ?,Block = ?,PlotNumber = ?,PaymentType = ?,BookingAmount = ?,BookingDate = ?,BaseSellingPrice = ?,PLCCharges = ?, TotalAmount = ?,BookedBy = ?,BookingType = ?,InstallmentStartDate = ?,AgentId = ?, AdditionalCharges = ?,AdditionalChargesTax = ?,CreatedBy = ?, Discount = ?, DiscountType = ? WHERE BookingId = ?

Transaction.InsertQuery: INSERT INTO PaymentDetails (CustomerId,BookingId,CollectedBy,PaymentType,PaymentMode, TransactionId, PaymentDate, ReceiptNo,BankName,Amount,TransactionDate,CollectedOn) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO InstallmentDetails (CustomerId,BookingId,CollectedBy,PaymentType,DueDate,PaymentMode, AmountPaid , Status , TransactionId, PaymentDate, ReceiptNo,BankName,InstallmentAmount,Interest,WaiveOff,CollectedOn ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Transaction.UpdateQuery: UPDATE InstallmentDetails SET ReceiptNo = ?, InstallmentAmount = ?, Interest = ?, WaiveOff = ?, PaymentDate = ?, TotalAmount = ?, InterestPaid = ?, TotalAmountPaid = ?, PendingAmount = ?, PaymentMode = ?,BankName = ?,TransactionId = ?, TransactionDate = ?,Status = ?,CollectedBy = ?, CollectedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?

Transaction.InsertQuery: INSERT INTO FarmerPayment (FarmerId,LandId,FarmerName,PaymentDate, PaymentMode,BankName, PaymentAmount, TransactionId, TransactionDate, CreatedBy,CreatedOn,ApprovedOn,ApprovedBy,ReceiptNo) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Transaction.UpdateQuery: UPDATE FarmerPayment SET ApprovedBy = {1} , ApprovedOn = SYSDATE(),IsApproved = {3}, Status = {4} WHERE Id = {2} AND ApprovedOn is null

Transaction.InsertQuery: INSERT INTO AgentPayment (AgentId,AgentName,PaymentDate, PaymentMode,BankName, PaymentAmount, TransactionId, TransactionDate, CreatedBy,CreatedOn) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
Transaction.UpdateQuery: UPDATE AgentPayment SET ApprovedBy = {1} , ApprovedOn = SYSDATE(),IsApproved = {3}, Status = {4}' WHERE Id = {2} AND ApprovedOn is null
UPDATE ExpenseDetails SET ApprovedBy = {1} , ApprovedOn = SYSDATE(),IsApproved = {3}, Status = {4} WHERE Id = {2} AND ApprovedOn is null

Search.SearchQuery: SELECT a.Id as id, a.CustomerId as customerId, a.CustomerName as customerName,a.Address as address,a.State as state, a.PinCode as pinCode, a.EmailId as emailId, a.PanNumber as panNumber,a.RelationType as relationType,a.RelativeName as relativeName , a.City as city, a.Nationality as nationality,a.PhoneNo as phoneNo,a.DateOfBirth as dateOfBirth,a.Occupation as occupation FROM CustomerDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b on b.BookingId = a.BookingId WHERE {MACRO}

SELECT a.Id as id, a.CustomerId as customerId, a.CustomerName as customerName,c.AgentName as agentName,DATE_FORMAT(b.BookingDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as bookingDate,b.BookingId as bookingId, b.ProjectName as projectName,b.FirmName as firmName,b.Block as block,b.PlotNumber as plotNumber,b.TotalAmount as totalAmount,b.TotalPaidAmount as totalPaidAmount, b.BookingType as bookingType,DATE_FORMAT(b.LastPaymentDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as paymentDate,e.PlotSize as plotSize,e.SqFtRate as sqftRate FROM CustomerDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b on b.BookingId = a.BookingId LEFT OUTER JOIN AgentMaster c on b.AgentId = c.AgentId INNER JOIN PlotTransaction d ON d.BookingId = b.BookingId INNER JOIN PlotDetails e ON e.Id = d.PlotId WHERE a.CustomerType = 'Primary' AND (IsCancelled is null || IsCancelled = 'N') AND e.Status = 'Booked' AND {MACRO}

SELECT a.Id as id, a.CustomerId as customerId, a.CustomerName as customerName,c.AgentName as agentName,DATE_FORMAT(b.BookingDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as bookingDate,b.BookingId as bookingId, b.ProjectName as projectName,b.FirmName as firmName,b.Block as block,b.PlotNumber as plotNumber,b.TotalAmount as totalAmount,b.TotalPaidAmount as totalPaidAmount, b.BookingType as bookingType,DATE_FORMAT(b.LastPaymentDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as paymentDate,e.PlotSize as plotSize,e.SqFtRate as sqftRate FROM CustomerDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b on b.BookingId = a.BookingId LEFT OUTER JOIN AgentMaster c on b.AgentId = c.AgentId INNER JOIN PlotTransaction d ON d.BookingId = b.BookingId INNER JOIN PlotDetails e ON e.Id = d.PlotId WHERE a.CustomerType = 'Primary' AND (IsCancelled is null || IsCancelled = 'N') AND e.Status = 'Booked' AND b.BookingType = 'MLM' AND {MACRO}

SELECT a.CustomerName as customerName, b.FirmName as firmName,b.ProjectName as projectName,b.block as block,b.PlotNumber as plotNumber,c.AgentName as agentName,DATE_FORMAT(d.PaymentDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as paymentDate,d.PaymentMode as paymentMode,CASE WHEN d.PaymentMode = 'Cheque' THEN d.ChequeDate ELSE d.TransactionDate END as transactionDate, CASE WHEN d.PaymentMode = 'Cheque' THEN d.ChequeNo ELSE d.TransactionId END as transactionId,d.BankName as bankName,d.InstallmentAmount as installmentAmount, d.PaidInstallment as paidInstallment FROM CustomerDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b ON a.CustomerId = b.CustomerId LEFT OUTER JOIN AgentMaster c ON c.AgentId = b.AgentId INNER JOIN PaymentDetails d ON d.BookingId = b.BookingId where d.PaymentDate is not null AND d.IsCancelled is null AND {MACRO}

SELECT a.CustomerName as customerName,a.PhoneNo as phoneNo, CASE WHEN d.PendingAmount = 0.00 || d.PendingAmount is null THEN d.InstallmentAmount ELSE d.PendingAmount END as pendingAmount ,DATE_FORMAT(b.BookingDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as bookingDate, b.FirmName as firmName,b.ProjectName as projectName,b.block as block,b.PlotNumber as plotNumber,DATE_FORMAT(d.DueDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as dueDate FROM CustomerDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b ON a.CustomerId = b.CustomerId INNER JOIN InstallmentDetails d ON d.BookingId = b.BookingId where d.Status ='Pending' and d.DueDate < SYSDATE() AND (b.IsCancelled is null || b.IsCancelled = 'N') AND {MACRO}

SELECT pd.Id as plotId,pd.PlotNo as plotNo, pd.FirmName as firmName,pd.ProjectName as projectName,pd.Block as block,pd.SqftRate as sqftRate, pd.PlotSize as plotSize,Facing as facing FROM PlotDetails pd WHERE Status = 'Available' AND {MACRO}
SELECT Id as id, KhasraNumber as khasraNumber, LandAmount as landValue, PaidAmount as paidAmount ,( LandAmount - PaidAmount )as remainingAmount from LandMaster WHERE {MACRO}

SELECT a.Id as id, a.AgentId as agentId, b.AgentName as agentName,b.ReceiptNo as receiptNo, b.PaymentMode as paymentMode, b.PaymentAmount as paymentAmount,BankName as bank, DATE_FORMAT(TransactionDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as transactionDate, TransactionId as transactionId, CreatedBy as createdBy, DATE_FORMAT(CreatedOn,'%d/%m/%Y') as createdOn, a.TotalCommission as totalAmount,a.AmountPaidTillNow from AgentPayment b INNER JOIN AgentBusinessDetails a ON a.AgentId = b.AgentId WHERE {MACRO}

SELECT f.Id as id, f.FarmerName as farmerName, f.ReceiptNo as receiptNo, f.PaymentMode as paymentMode,f.BankName as bankName,f.CreatedOn as createdOn, f.CreatedBy as createdBY,DATE_FORMAT(f.TransactionDate ,'%d/%m/%Y') as transactionDate, f.PaymentAmount as paymentAmount, l.KhasraNumber as khasraNumber,l.LandAmount as landAmount,l.PaidAmount as paidAmount from FarmerPayment f INNER JOIN LandMaster l ON l.id = f.LandId where {MACRO};

SELECT a.Id as id,DATE_FORMAT(a.DueDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as dueDate, a.BookingId as bookingId,a.CustomerId as customerId,InstallmentAmount as installmentAmount,AmountPaid as amountPaid, Interest as interest, WaiveOff as interestWaiveOff,InterestPaid as interestPaid, TotalAmountPaid as amount, PendingAmount as pendingAmount,Status as status FROM InstallmentDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b ON a.BookingId = b.BookingId WHERE {MACRO}

select a.BookingId as bookingId, a.PaymentId as paymentId, a.Amount as amount, a.PaymentType as paymentType , a.PaymentMode as paymentMode, a.TransactionId as transactionId,a.ReceiptNo as receiptNo, a.BankName as bank,DATE_FORMAT(a.PaymentDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as paymentDate,DATE_FORMAT(a.TransactionDate,'%d/%m/%Y') as transactionDate from PaymentDetails a INNER JOIN BookingDetails b ON b.BookingId = a.BookingId WHERE {MACRO}
SELECT PlotNo as plotNo, FirmName as firmName,ProjectName,Block as block,SqftRate as sqftRate, PlotSize as plotSize,Status as status FROM PlotDetails WHERE {MACRO}
